title: [音乐] 1.7.10服务器游戏音乐怎么更换
author: 让基佬发芽
txt_content: 我看着1.6.4有music文件夹  然后1.7.10没有怎么更改

replies.author: 晴天娃娃_
replies.txt_content: 什么意思？？？要改客户端的材质包吧 ，不想改你可尝试一下这个https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=806960

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
你可以试试这个工具，1.7.10 音乐好像是在那个 a 开头的文件夹里

https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-725187-1-1.html

replies.author: 让基佬发芽
replies.txt_content:
Mine_永恒 发表于 2019-7-31 20:58
什么意思？？？要改客户端的材质包吧 ，不想改你可尝试一下这个https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewt ...
不是 客户端的音乐 就是修改原本有的音乐

replies.author: KyLin默寒
replies.txt_content:
一：可通过材质包改唱片音乐
二：通过插件
[管理|娱乐]ServerMusic服务器音乐 —— 享受音乐的时代[1.6.4-1.7.9]
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php? ... Btype%5D%3Dcheckbox
三：【不推荐这种】首先，打开MC目录,找到\.minecraft\assets\objects
"minecraft/sounds/records/13.ogg": {

"hash": "9cbed0e40296f68c61090c9b81816061e068a0ec",

"size": 1071028

"minecraft/sounds/records/mall.ogg": {

"hash": "83233451430516d839eaee855a2f789b8985d457",

"size": 1430016

"minecraft/sounds/records/stal.ogg": {

"hash": "2c4f3f8f259dc782867727311fea30875ecc3917",

"size": 1180789

"minecraft/sounds/records/mellohi.ogg": {

"hash": "6b44d0539073353b7a05330ccddc5735ba5efca4",

"size": 663709

"minecraft/sounds/records/far.ogg": {

"hash": "f46c38e7d6d7b19d5d68aa18b557215738deb36a",

"size": 1285938

"minecraft/sounds/records/chirp.ogg": {

"hash": "ec8a2cbdf68b4e2136098ec33695e1c53625ddb8",

"size": 1379756

"minecraft/sounds/records/strad.ogg": {

"hash": "f34afa3ba5f756e90a1f61023bbe069ee8442608",

"size": 1558180

"minecraft/sounds/records/ward.ogg": {

"hash": "f685021d4f26d6b590bffb341908e25e92e18cef",

"size": 1987588

"minecraft/sounds/records/wait.ogg": {

"hash": "876655d1691803f4cef17a6288d971285be79c6a",

"size": 1845255

"minecraft/sounds/records/11.ogg": {

"hash": "f86c466225dad2f32c90981485c1965671b3e8e6",

"size": 591997

"minecraft/sounds/records/blocks.ogg": {

"hash": "9b2a01e0d0456b8fbe33557fbc19d4fe342f94d6",

"size": 2587419

"minecraft/sounds/records/cat.ogg": {

"hash": "d1eb3d2e39bf1f6289cfcbca44e1c9bb508b20f0",

"size": 1286636
这是12首唱片
如搜索15f38314274e759c44f50ac641d11bde12474a25

之后找到该文件的位置
把你要替换的音乐文件转码成.ogg格式(一定要转)
把他放到15f38314274e759c44f50ac641d11bde12474a25的文件夹里

之后复制15f38314274e759c44f50ac641d11bde12474a25这一串东西

修改你的音乐文件，名字为15f38314274e759c44f50ac641d11bde12474a25PS：后面没有任何的东西
